name: Spork (Mattias "Mau" Lundell)
description:
In this old school text based game you wander around a dungeon trying to escape. The game is a parody of the 1977 text based game “Zork”.

Spork was made as an highschool project where we were to create a text based game during 2 weeks time. The game is made in C++ and uses the computers console window as it's display. This was a game I made myself in march 2018.
